---
title: "Comparing BayesMix and Mclust for individual cohort assignment"
output: html_notebook
---

Loading libraries and length/weight data:
```{r,echo=FALSE}
#loading libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(bayesmix)
library(mclust)
library(wesanderson)

#loading data
#load in length and weight data
df <- read.table("AgingModels/lw_2019_locations_081220.txt",header = T,sep = "\t",stringsAsFactors = F)

#manipulating data frame
df1 <- df %>% 
  mutate(ID2 = ID_indiv) %>% 
  rename(ID=ID_indiv) %>% 
  separate(ID2,into = c("spp","loc","num"),sep = "_") %>% 
  filter(loc != "GRN") %>% 
  select(ID,loc,everything()) %>% 
  select(-spp:-num) %>% 
  mutate(samp = paste(loc,Year_collect,sep = "_"))
samples <- unique(df1$samp)
samples <- sort(samples)
```
